website_summaries.verdict: These are surprisingly bright little road flares for a surprisingly low amount of money.
pros: These flares have both a solid LED light mode as well as a flashing light mode
They are even brighter than some of the more expensive options
cons: They are generally not as durable as most of the similar-designed flares
They may not last as long as others

customer_reviews.title: Great product and give you another safe as possible
customer_reviews.text: Good product very bright works as advertised. Please use them to prevent accidents. Wouldn’t want anyone to get hurt. You stand a better chance have a couple sets of these things out. Also helps to cover your butt from liability during her break down. Please do everything you can to keep yourself another safe. I had a close call her recently during her break down. It made me decide to buy several different devices to try to warn people of imminent danger bring freaked out.
customer_reviews.author: John J Hill

customer_reviews.title: Function well, built like cheap chinese junk
customer_reviews.text: I like the operation and they work great. But the construction is poor. I'm not going to return them, but I do need to mix up some epoxy and glue the magnets back into their spots so that they will attach to the bases. They are currently priced at $8.50. If you have some epoxy laying around that needs to be used or keep a supply, $8.50 probably is a fair price. The batteries that are included probably need to be replaced with decent batteries anyway, so we will call that a wash. Again, the price is fair, these are fairly decent on visibility and are small and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Crap product
customer_reviews.text: Two of the three flares didn't work and one came with the plastic broken where the screw should be.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H.

customer_reviews.title: Useful Emergency Light
customer_reviews.text: I bought these more for the red led flashlight but optionally for the emergency options. They would work for an emergency warning use but their light weight might make them easy for wind to topple them over.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Pierson

customer_reviews.title: I like the product.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. I got these for myself and my daughter to put in our safety kit in our cars. Thank goodness We have not had to use them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Luvada Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: DId not turn off. Had to send back. Was not too bright
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: One dead unit, flimsy bases
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. One of the units was dead on arrival. The magnetic base that is supposed to hold these upright isn't big enough to actually keep these standing up on the shoulder of an interstate, they need to be much wider. Overall, a cheap and flimsy plastic product that isn't worth $5. I wish I was able to find some roadside flares for less than $50.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 of the 3 work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for an emergency car kit I was putting together. I ordered things from a variety of places so it took me a while to put them altogether. Only one of the three flares worked and since its 8 days past the 30 day return window I'm stuck with them. I would not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Marie Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these (Total of 12 flares) of those 6 work good, 2 have some light but not enough to make a difference, 2 that have broken bases and 2 that have batteries that have leaked inside of the flare. It would be a mistake to every count on something of this little quality in an emergency so don't make the mistake I did and buy the cheap ones.
customer_reviews.author: Skunk Ape

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product - 5 of 6 in the 2 sets of 3 that I ordered work good - just 1 flare doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent! The price, packaging and delivery were also excellent. The only problem is that of the 2 sets of 3 flares that I bought only 5 of them work - there was just 1 that did not work. I don't see the point of sending it back for replacement because of the great price to begin with and the fact I'm alright with having just 5 flares in my emergency road kid.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but cheap
customer_reviews.text: These are great little lights, but they are cheaply built. Gonna keep mine cause I want them for our horse trailer. 1 of the 3 won't flash and has lost the little pin that keeps the cover end on the light assembly. Not sure it's going to hurt anything and I'll just put it between the other flashing ones. Might not ever stay standing alongside the highway either. Not much of a base to stand on. No matter, they are going in the roadside emergency kit and I hope to never use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Haven't needed them as yet
customer_reviews.text: They do not take up a lot of space in my trunk and hopefully I'll never need them. They are a nice package and do not take up a lot of space in my trunk
customer_reviews.author: CnS Computers

customer_reviews.title: Very small.  Only about 6 inches high and 1/2 inch diamater
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller then they looked online. I guess it's better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Dean_R

customer_reviews.title: Great graduation gift
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Bright lights . Magnets are not perfect but work none the less. Keep in the dashboard for emergency. Bought several sets as graduation gifts
customer_reviews.author: Mary Callaway

customer_reviews.title: Portable & great for trunk kits.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Makes you more visible on the road.
customer_reviews.author: K88

customer_reviews.title: buy something else
customer_reviews.text: One was broken. One is on life support. One works decent. I threw one of them away the second I opened it. All that said. Its cheap, I'm putting it in my truck if I need to change a flat. It would be better just to buy some red chem lights. (same price)
customer_reviews.author: Jeb McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Just plain flimsy and not well built. Poor instructions and OK for the price, but I expected more from Life Gear. It would get 1 STAR, but one of the three did work after trial and two errors. Quick delivery and I didn't bother Customer Support as they were cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product/ safer than phosphorus flares
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the take up less space than the traditional flares and wont burn you. wish I'd shopped it around though for a better price...
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Safety on the Road
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my new travel trailer for those times I need to alert the traffic that I am stopped on the road
customer_reviews.author: Blogman45

customer_reviews.title: All work like they are supposed to work
customer_reviews.text: First batch had a defective flare. Returned and reordered. All work like they are supposed to work. It was not the seller's fault. The feel cheap and plastic- which is their design.
customer_reviews.author: JMW

customer_reviews.title: somewhat of a neat idea, however the quality just ...
customer_reviews.text: somewhat of a neat idea, however the quality just isn't there nor is the brightness there. As mentioned in other reviews you will not see this item standing up to a long when vehicles drive by.
customer_reviews.author: SteveG

customer_reviews.title: Light is rally weak and these things are tiny.
customer_reviews.text: Light is rally weak and these things are tiny. There's no way these would alert traffic if you were on the side of the road
customer_reviews.author: Ian Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Better then nothing but i don't recommend.  Flimsy base with easily lost magnets
customer_reviews.text: The lighting device is fine. It all comes down to the base. The base is detachable and is not wide enough to stand on anything other then a completely flat service. Also the magnets that attaach to the light tube seperate and are easily lost.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Steimel

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product is useless. The magnets break off as soon as you use them. They only flash for about 20 min and then stops. Unless you planning on holding this in your hand, this is a waste to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Liquid_Boy26

customer_reviews.title: There about 3in tall
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I would think. 3in tall but the lights are bright. I'm getting more next week for family.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: One base came unglued right out of the package. It's also really hard to get it to the strobe setting. We marked ours with permanent marker.
customer_reviews.author: EFRA

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's like a chem light and has a blinking, non blinking and white beam.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Safety is key
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I feel safe knowing they are ready for use in my car. Great gift for a new driver or frequent road traveler.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these and they work great but as another review said the magnet needs to to be glued better.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Better to get real roadside flares
customer_reviews.text: To lightweight. I had to actually use them once and the were blown over by passing cars. Better to get real roadside flares.
customer_reviews.author: JimB

customer_reviews.title: Good Items to Have in Car
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these yet but they appear to be very good items to carry in the car, in your backpack or on the bike. Arrived on time and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the magnets to put on side of car. Wish they were longer.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. The first one I tried broke beyond repair.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdmon1959

customer_reviews.title: Not Bright
customer_reviews.text: Can somewhat be seen at night but is invisible during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They are great addition to my car emergency kit.
customer_reviews.author: William Matschukat

customer_reviews.title: Do not Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: One out of three worked Nice Idea but not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: oldsoldier

customer_reviews.title: Road Emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the opportunity to use them. Nice and compact size - don't take up too much room in car. Look like they'll be easy to use and will stand up in adverse conditions.
customer_reviews.author: P. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a bit of safety small and compact.
customer_reviews.text: I think these work nicely for a car or truck, Figured out you had to twist them to turn them on. Instructions left something to be desired. Overall not bad for a little safety..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: What garbage! 2 of them broke when I turned them gently. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Florian J. Steciuch

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but is a great addition to my car emergency kit!
customer_reviews.author: J Squeeze

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: IS EVERYTHING AS ADVERTIZED. WORKS GREAT AND SAFE TO STORE. GETTING MORE FOR MY MOTHER AND CHILDREN FOR THEIR VEHICLES.
customer_reviews.author: arkus

customer_reviews.title: The description of product said: " rechargeable Nickel Metal ...
customer_reviews.text: The description of product said: " rechargeable Nickel Metal battery that can be recharged in any cigarette lighter." And does not can be rechargeable this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: Need to adjust my expectations to a $6 item
customer_reviews.text: Magnetic base is a separate piece. Not sure the two would stay together in splashing slush or perhaps even water. Fragile plastic housing cracked while trying to understand rotation method to turn on/off. Probably not weather tight now. Very careful with units now. Overall pretty flimsy. Not worth returning.
customer_reviews.author: A Likely Story

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very bright. Bought extra sets for family members.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COOL!
customer_reviews.text: These are so freakin cool! I love their small compact size and they are super bright too! Gonna get another set for other vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: DENNIS GROMAN

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Di not buy them they stop working the 2nd day u used them -- crap. .
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie.Vonnie

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to road flares
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these in each of my vehicles. You have the option of solid or blinking red. Each one had a magnet that can be used to attach to the vehicle. The drawback is that the light portion falls over a little too easily. Other than that, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Diedre58

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very poor build quality, one of these arrived with the base already snapped off due to cheap glue.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B Corwin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Bright, easy to work, free holding or attaches to magnetic bottom easily. Definitely lasts longer then tradition flares!!! Will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: BB2

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall for the price they are pretty good. The small magnets do fall out easily, so checking them out before you put them in your glove box. One of the three fell out on mine, but a little bit of glue fixed that. Considering that 30 min road flares run around $3 each these are a good buy, even if you only use it once.
customer_reviews.author: J. Niver

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my teen-aged daughter to keep in her car in case of emergency. They are an awesome addition to any auto emergency kit!
customer_reviews.author: MHKindle

customer_reviews.title: Safety first
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them yet. Hope I don't have to. Got my sister, my hubs, and myself a set should we have an emergency and need to be seen. 4 stars just bc I haven't used them. Will update if I do.
customer_reviews.author: clovernicrn

customer_reviews.title: Emergency lights
customer_reviews.text: These are great to have in your vehicle in case you are broken down on the side of the road. They are of a size as to not take up too much room in your trunk.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for your vehicle
customer_reviews.text: I love Life Gear flashlights, so added these to my car for safety. I tried them out in the driveway and wow, they are easy to set up and very easily seen in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Tough Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Best idea I have seen in a long time. Environmentally friendly, easy to work and good visibility. Only criticism is that the packaging is too hard to open. I recommend that you open this package long before you might need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Kristof

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Our lake house is 3 hours away 1/2 of which consist of pitch black winding roads. Had to clear some brush I ran over out from underneath my car... felt much safer climbing under the car with these lit up. I suggest placing one a little further away from the car (i put mine on the blind curve just before where I had to pull over) so cars coming around corners see that one first. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: zac82993

customer_reviews.title: LifeGear Eco- friendly LED Emergency Road Flares
customer_reviews.text: Life Gear's Eco-friendly LED road flares are light weight and will be handy to have should we need them.
customer_reviews.author: Annie B

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Super handy, haven't used them and hope i wont have too lol don't want to get in any kind of accident!
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: ... were a little stronger but for the price its nice to have in my
customer_reviews.text: Wish the magnets were a little stronger but for the price its nice to have in my car
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, compact, but very bright in the dark. Easy to store in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Clock Curator

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A MUST FOR EVERY CAR. BOUGHT A SET FOR ALL MY CARS AND COMPANY FLEET TRUCKS
customer_reviews.author: Leonidas X Ioannou

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good idea, product is good, but could be a bit more brighter. Overall, a good product
customer_reviews.author: JGF, Lcdr, ret

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: When the magnets fall out just a dab of super glue solves the problem
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: been looking for flares for my car for a long time. great
customer_reviews.author: vivster03884

customer_reviews.title: Protection on the road
customer_reviews.text: I have to rate this as a 4 star because I have never actually used it (and don't want to). I bought it for security and prevention on long trips. It is comforting to know that something like this is simple, relatively inexpensive, and will do its job along with the new cell phones, emergency blankets and whatever. A great back-up and light source.
customer_reviews.author: Tinker

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable in daylight, really grabs your attention at night ...
customer_reviews.text: Noticeable in daylight, really grabs your attention at night! So much safer and convenient than "old style" burning flares, plus they will last a lot longer than the 15, 20 or 30 minutes that burning flares last.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Grayson

customer_reviews.title: but extremely visible and easy to
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a little tipsy due to a small base, but extremely visible and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: William H Paton

product_meta.title: Life Gear LED Emergency Road Flares 3-Pack, Reusable Safety Glow Stick with Flasher & Magnetic Bases - Batteries Included
product_meta.description: Color:RedWhether you're heading to the neighborhood market or driving cross-country on a family camping trip, when on the road it is always critical to be prepared. Keeping safety tools, such as emergency flashers and a working flashlight allows you to prepare for the unexpected. The Life Gear Glow Emergency Flares (3 Pack) are long lasting LED signalling lights. Containing no chemicals or flammable materials, LED flares are a much safer option than incendiary flares. These LED lights are re-usable over and over with up to 150 hours of battery life. Simple to use - Just twist on for solid red, turn off and twist again for blinking red light. The magnetic flares can be attached to the metal body of your car or set in the included base as a stand alone flare creating a visible, long lasting emergency light at night.
feature_bullets: 2 LIGHT MODES: Twist to turn on/off and Switch between a bright LED red glow and emergency red flashing / signaling mode
DURABILITY: The Reusable roadside flare is water and impact resistant
LED LIGHT LIFE: Long lasting LED light lasts 100 hours in flashing light mode, 20 hours in solid red mode and has an auto off feature after 1 hr to preserve the batteries. included

SAFETY: Stand up your LED road flare with the magnetic base to help in signaling for help, warning others of accidents or stopped vehicles, alerting other drivers of obstacles or while changing a tire.

specifications.Warranty Description: Life+Gear products have been designed based on the highest quality standards and are warranted against defects in material and workmanship for one year from the date of purchase. Damages caused by misuse, alteration or normal wear and tear are not covered under this warranty. Warranty is limited only to replacement of this product.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars178 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
